title: YAML Application Description
description: An AICA application graph description using YAML syntax.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The schema version of the application syntax

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: The application dependencies, including the version of AICA Core and any required packages

core.title: Core Version
core.description: The version of the AICA Core image

packages.title: Application Packages
packages.description: A list of packages required by the application

items.title: Package Details
items.description: The specification of a package name and version with optional version constraints

version.title: Package Version
version.description: The specific version of the package used by the author of the application

constraints.title: Package Version Constraint
constraints.description: A range of acceptable package versions that are supported by the application defined by constraints. For more details on syntax, see https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/expressions/version-constraints

metadata.title: Application Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata used to describe the application for user convenience. This information may be used by parsers to search or sort database applications

description.title: Application Description
description.description: A brief description of the application

tags.title: Application Tags
tags.description: A collection of user-defined tags that provide additional context for categorizing the application

userdata.title: User Data
userdata.description: This property accepts any data structure and will be ignored by the syntax parser. It can be used to store additional metadata or context about the application for user convenience.
